1.Text:
Ahahahaha! Haha, hahahaha! All of you, aaall of you!
I'll destroy all of you!
Urk... Enough! That'll be difficult for you!
Yes! Exactly! Exactly, exactly!
You've got some nerve, Gamma!
But we're done for if we get hit by that attack!

Is that your primal instinct? Ahahaha, youuu aaare
correeect!

My powerful attack...is an instant death, one-hit
kill if it gets you! You'll turn into little specks
and be blooown away by the wind!

(It's always hard to know what she'll do, but her
destructive power is nothing to laugh at.)
Okay, here I cooome. Let's gooo.
She disappeared?
Move!
Boo.
Huh! When did youâ?
Gah!
Claire!
How was that? I'm the strongest, right?!
What the...?
(Her arm was blown away from her left shoulder...)
(Just one hit... Incredible power.)
Lady Alpha...
Yes, I know.

Epsilon, Zeta, Delta! Surround her! Let's quickly
push past!
Got it!
Leave it to me!
Graaarf!

Oh? Three versus one? I don't mind, but you know
it'll be really embarrassing if you lose, right?!
Three versus one... Are you sure about that?

I see. That means the vanguard of three out front
will create a disturbance, then the two in the back
will slip through when they see an opportunity.

Hmph! It's not good to bully the weak! Well, even
with five against one, you're still the weak ones!!!

Gamma. I'll change you back. I just don't know how
to do that yet.
I'll do it. I will.

I don't care about going back to how I was
at all. Actually, I definitely don't want to!

I was powerless, always hiding in the shadows,
and only good at making money.
That super weak version of me has no meaning!

No one thinks that about you. Deep down, I don't
think you do either.
It's pointless to talk to her right now.
How 'bout we defeat her!
There's no way you can do that!
Haaaaaah!

Graaarf? She's getting faster, but she's still the
same Gamma as before, right?

I knew it! Gamma is still Gamma! This'll be a
cakewalk!
Don't get careless!
Aha!
Woof! She's way faster than usual!
I'll go nonstop like a buzzing little insect!
Awoo! Oh! Gah!
What's wrong? Is blocking me all you can do?!
You...you've got some nerve, Gamma!
Yeah?! H-Here I go! I'm going to speed up!
Hah!
Take this!

Hmph! You really thought that weak magic would
get me?!
That's depressing. Those two should have gone firâ!
Agh!
I'm over here too!
When she turns her back...I'll do it.
Graaaaaah!!!
That's it! Keep attacking like that, everyone!
Work together to restrain her so we don't take a hit!

Gggrrr...! Argh, one right after another!
Hasty girls!

It looks like she's on the defensive and irritated.
I might be able to get her!

Delta, fall back a bit! Close combat with Gamma
right now isâ!
Now's my chance!
Grrarf?!
Too bad!!! No chance for yooouuu!!!
Delta!
Dumb dog!!!
Ah!
Aaagh!
Epsilon!
Hm, it got you?

(Th-That was dangerous... What a close call.
Thankfully Epsilon saved Delta by pushing her
out of the way.)
(But now there's a wound on Epsilon's back...)

If you two really want to become ground meat that
badly, I'll chop you up together!
I won't let you!
Eeek! Urgh!
Delta! Get Epsilon out of there now!
Grar...
Ugh... I'm sorry, Lady Alpha... I've been defeated...
Pull yourself together!

(The wound on her back is terrible. I can't treat her
properly in this situation, though...)
Ahahahahaha! Who's next?! I'm not losing todaaay!
Grrr... Lady Alpha...

Don't worry. In any case, we have to subdue Gamma
now.

(Gamma's incredible swordsmanship makes it impossible
to predict her movement, so we can't get close to her.)

(She even deflects our long distance attacks so it
looks like there's no chance for us attack her.)
(But, there is a way. Well, there was...)

(Without Epsilon, it's harder to defend ourselves
against Gamma's fierce attacks.)
(If it keeps going like this...)
Hey, Pente... I know it's a drag, but...
Let's go. If we can stop her then we might win this!
Agh... Wait, you two. I'll go.
Huh?

Me and the therianthropes should continue to avoid
any attacks and distract Gamma together, right?
Hm? Yes... You know exactly what to do.

It'll save some time, but the question is whether
or not it will create an opening for you.

Don't worry about that. I know Gamma better than
anyone else.
I understand. In that case, I'll leave it to you.
Is your strategy meeting over?

No matter how much you think about it, I'm going to
send all of you flying, so there's really no point!

Everyone, stick to the plan. Beta and Eta, back us
up, please.
Got it.
Alright...

I'll go behind Zeta, Delta, and Olivier. When Gamma
gives us an opening...I'll attack.

Either way it's a problem of timing, right? Just so
you know, I won't run out of magic!
I'll put you all together and chop you up!
Hyaaaaaah!!!
Hmph.
Dodged it?! Argh!

A-Amazing... She's dodging all of her attacks even in
close combat...

How on Earth is she predicting those erratic
movements?
(You're wrong...)

(She's not predicting her next moves. She sees the
moves and then dodges them.)

(While I keep attacking from far away and distract
Gamma, I'm trying not to get in the way.)
You! You!
Ah!
Ahahaha! I got you! Look, I'm getting faster!
Hey, if this keeps going...

Don't worry. If you keep dodging her attacks, then
I'll definitelyâ!

Swish! Swish swish swish swiiiiish!!! Enough... I will
completely destroy yâEeek!
There!
Aaagh! Argh, my sword!
Now! Hyaaah!
Gwah!
Secured!
Grah!
Aaah!

Your...power's incredible! Everyone else's power is
too!

Aaah... Of course, it's impossible against this many
of you...
Amazing. You really neutralized her.
Olivier is incredible too. And they are as well...
I'm sorry, Gamma. Please sleep for a while.

Thank you, everyone... And Olivier too... Thanks to
all of you, everything worked out.

I wondered what you meant by dodge her attacks, but
now I get it.

Gamma had erratic movements, extraordinary power, and
speed. But no matter how amazing it all wasâ
She is hopelessly bereft of talent in battle.
That's Gamma for you.
But somehow we were able to subdue her...

(The harm done...was too great. Epsilon and Claire
were injured.)

(Oh... I wish we could turn back time, especially at
a time like this...)
Lili, how are things going over there?
It seems alright.

I'm glad those were the only injuries...and things
will be okay.
C-Claire?!

Uh...what's going on? I'm certain that your left arm
was gone, but...
I-I'm really confused too...

I have finished healing Epsilon as well. Things
should be okay now.

Lady Alpha...I...lost way too much blood and lost
conciousness, but...
I'm...alive.
Y-Yes...
It's...there... There's no doubt.

It doesn't feel strange at all either. It feels like
maybe...I was wrong about everything...

I want to say there's no way...but I don't even know
anymore.
What's going on?

It's because you two were alive. That's why I was
able to heal you both.
I don't understand what you're saying.
I saw what happened... Your arm...was gone...

But with her magic...it started coming back...where the
wound happened...
C-Coming back...

You didn't die. As long as you're not dead, Lili can
heal you.
That's it.
Grarf?

If we're done here then let's go quickly. Put her in
prison and get someone to guard her.
Th-Thank you, Olivier. And Lili...you saved us.
No problem! We're allies!
Not really.
Huh? Hey!
Huh? She has a bad attitude. Why?

That's the Three Heroes for you. They're real
monsters.

2.Text: Heh...hehehe...
Grarf?

Ahahahahaha! Super strong me is back! There's no way
you guys could defeat me!
Huh? But...I'm pretty sure we just did...

Stubborn, huh. The outcome won't change no matter how
many times we do this.
I don't know about that... Hya!
What?!
A t-tornado?! With one swing? Not possible!
A-Aaaaaaah!
Oh no! Olivier!

Now then, it's your turn, everyone! I'll blow you all
the way to the moon and add another crater!
Eek!
Ack! It's going to blow us away!
No...if it keeps going...we'll get wiped out!
Hmph. It's a pleasant, gentle breeze.
Huh?!
Th-That's...impossible!

Gamma, I can't let you drag this mess out any longer.
It ends now.
Master Shadow!!!

N-No way... I'm shaking... The real deal...
My heart's racing...
No, that's impossible. I can't let him deceive me!

You're a capable kid! But not the real deal. Yeah!
I'll blow you awaaay!
Huh! Wh-Whaaat?!

Fly away. To the moon or wherever. Go wherever you
want.
N-No! Aaaaaah!!!
Master Shadow! I-Is it really you?

Princess, is my ghost reflected in your innocent
eyes?

Uh! No, Master Shadow. It is your magnificent and
divine form! I believed that...surely you were still
alive!

The time has come. I will rule this world and create
the Shadow Kingdom.
Yes... The Shadow Kingdom!

The dearest wish I whispered every night before going
to sleep is finally going to come true!
Yes. Now then, Princess. Take my hand.
Got it!

There is only one who is worthy of creating a new era
with me.

Master Shadow! I will follow you, even if it's to
hell!

Congratulations, Beta. Your place is beside him.
Now then, everyone! A big round of applause to
send them off.

Clapping and loud cheering... Very suitable for their
first steps on their journey.

Good grief... The only one who is worthy of
Master Shadow is you.
Congratulations!
Congratulations...
Congratulations!

I...will definitely create the Shadow Kingdom with
him and be happy!
âThat's what will happen.

If we believe what you're saying...Cid can be revived
with that artifact, right?
Yes. Not just your younger brother, but Shadow too.

In other words, we just need to catch the mastermind
that has the Irreversible Pocket Watch and steal it
from them.

Looks like our clue to returning to our original era
might also lie there. What should we do with Gamma
from here on out?

Just...leave her in confinement. I don't know if we
can change her back or not though...
Shall I assign guards?
Hm... Beta, what do you think?
Ah... Shadowâ
Beta?
Y-Yes! We're talking about Master Shadow, right?
Not Shadow, but Gamma. What's up with you?

Um... Ah... I'm sorry. It seems I've become a little
tired...
Alright. Yukime, can I get you to be on guard duty?
Sure thing. Leave it to me.

Thank you. Since Gamma and Yukime won't be coming,
the work that the five of us do will be important.

We need to track down the mastermind and get the
Irreversible Pocket Watch. So firstâ
Freya, help them and take down Diablos.
Understood.
Good. Now, about what we're going to do nextâ
Wait, hold on!
What's the matter?

Things are moving too fast, but I want to keep up
with you. Why are we just going along with this?
Because doing that will benefit both of us.

Um... I don't get it. Why did we go from talking
about finding the Irreversible Pocket Watch to
defeating Diablos?
We'd be grateful for that, but...

It is absolutely vital that we defeat Diablos in
order to revive Shadow and Cid.

The mastermind called Shadow to this era with
the Irreversible Pocket Watch.

But having us be called alongside of Shadow probably
wasn't part of their calculations.

However, Shadow was defeated and killed by Diablos.
Then right after that, time went backwards.
It went backwards after Shadow died.

If the mastermind was after that guy Shadow, they
should have used the Irreversible Pocket Watch to
turn back time to the moment before Shadow died.
But they didn't. Why not?

It's not that they didn't do it. I think it's because
they couldn't do it.

In other words, Diablos has an effect on the
Irreversible Pocket Watch and interferes with
the reversal of time, right?
Exactly, Sarasa.

Diablos absorbed the powerful magic and became even
stronger.

If they decided not to, it would have become
irresistible.

Right. So we have to defeat Diablos, who is getting
in the way, in order to return to the time when
Shadow and Cid were still alive.

And we'll find the mastermind. Those are the goals of
the Shadow Garden.

Your goals, defeating Diablos and finding the
mastermind, align with our own.

That is why we'll work with you. However, we believe
the mastermind is someone hiding in your group.

Oh my. I think the mastermind is really someone in
your group.

There's something to be done in this era. Isn't that
why someone called Shadow to the past?

Change the past to get an ideal future. It seems like
someone who thinks that could be in either era.
C-Calm down please, both of you.

We're going to work together, right? Let's stop
doubting each other and compromise.

We were the only ones who were able to defeat the
original Diablos.

Even though their group did something unnecessary,
you want to propose that both groups have a united
front, huh.
What did you just say?!

By absorbing Shadow's magic, Diablos became so
powerful that now it's almost too much to handle.

It might have been a little careless, foolish, or
reckless.

Foolish? Reckless? It's as if you mean Delta. This is
Master Shadow we're talking about. That's incredibly
inappropriate. Retract your words immediately.

Did you say my name just now? Too many hard words...
I don't understand what you're saying.

Master Shadow is a magnificent person! He is a person
of character who has a wealth of wisdom, he works
extremely hard for his noble ideals, and he isn't
arrogant even though he has unrivaled power!

There is no mistake in a plan that has everything
taken into consideration, including his death and
revival. In other words, it is not foolish or reckless!
Beta? Calm down a little.

That is because Master Shadow is one who has risen
above everything else! Flowers bloom in profusion,
stars shoot across the sky, and enemies prostrate
themselves at his feet! Fanfare resounds for him!

I give up... You're entering a fantasy world as you
speak.

*sigh*... Seriously... I really don't get you guys.
How do we report this to those above the Church...

We couldn't subdue our target. We got some mysterious
people from the future involved and things just
really progressed from there.

We became victims of Diablos, but were resurrected by
the power of the reversal of time.
My head...hurts...

Just say you don't know. You can't explain it
anyways.

That's an act of disloyalty to the Church. Hey,
Olivier, I say it all the time, but the obligation we
have to the Church isâ

No! Let's tell them everything like it is. Surely
everyone will believe us. After all, we are allies
of the Church!
If that's the case, then do whatever you want.

That's enough. I didn't rely on either of you from
the beginning. I'll do something about it.
I'm a bit surprised...that the real her is like that.

Well, she's been different than I imagined since the
beginning.

If we're talking about the Freya we know of through
history, she founded Midgar, was close to the people,
kind, and a person of character. But the person in
front of us is much different.

Well, it's not just Freya that we could say that
about... Things told to future generations might mix
in some fiction and exaggerations.

3.Text: Anyway, do what you like.
Where are you going?
I'll be around. Call me when you've finished talking.
Are you going to take a nap?
Perhaps.
...Hey, I want to ask you something.
Who are you exactly?
What is it you're fighting for?
Why are you askingâ
Answer me.
...To kill time.

To kill time...? Is that all? Even with all that
talent?

The person I look up to is never arrogant, and is
always looking to hone their skills.
And yet, you...
*sigh*

So, a sword wielded through hard work is beautiful,
but one wielded through talent is arrogant?
Ah!

People from the future sure talk a lot. Is obtaining
power really that important?

I'll go along with whatever you say. Do what you
want.
H-How dare you...
Princess Alexia?!
She just took a sword, didn't she?
Is she...going to fight?

Oh dear... Fighting is forbidden when we are supposed
to be joining forces.

This isn't good... I'll go and check out the situation
and put a stop to it if I have to.
...You don't have a clue what you're doing.

Do you understand what it means to stand before me
with your sword drawn?
That doesn't matter. There are more important things.
Haaaaaaahhh!
...Amateur.
Agh!
...Foolish.
Are you prepared to face my sword? Well thenâ
Olivier!
Hmph.
Agh... Why... Why?!

Why is his sword broken while yours remains intact?
Is the swordplay of someone gifted...somehow superior?

...If he's gone, then...I'll prove it! That the path
of this sword is not inferior at all!

Will you struggle and strive, trusting yourself to
reach new heights?

That is the imperfect sword of one who has nothing,
and I hate it the most.
Huh?!

Princess Alexia, let's tend to your wounds.
Your shoulderâ
It's fine!
Huh?
N-Nothing. I'm sorry... Would you lend me a hand?
Yes, of course.
Lady Alpha. Olivier seriously tried to...
I know...

It's best not to get too involved. You wouldn't want
there to be any bad blood later, right?

*sigh* Anyway, I'll be sure to report this matter
along with that of Diablos to the Church.

More importantly, let's have a more constructive
discussion, Alpha.
...Yes, that would be great.

How about we first weaken the subordinate vampires
before going after Diablos directly?
What?! Why waste the time? Let's just fight Diablos!
Be quiet, Delta.
Grar...

I'm fine with weakening their forces first. It wouldn't
be ideal if the vampire army showed up while we're
fighting Diablos.
Do we have any intel on the vampires?

We should target Gekitsuyon, the leader of the
largest faction among Diablos's subordinates.

First, let's take out the base we've already
identified.

We know where their base is, but we haven't done
anything about it yet?

It has entrances on the west and east sides, so to
clear it, we'd need to split into two groups to
break in.

So, we could split the team into two. I could lead
one half, and the other could be entrusted to
Sarasa...

I was hesitant because I thought it might be too much
of a burden, but with you on board...
...Good. Then let's work together.

The eastern and western entrances are far apart. The
mountain range between them means it will take
several days just to reach the eastern entrance.

We'll head to the eastern side. Wait for us to
arrive, then proceed with the attack on the western
side.

Okay, that sounds good. However, I'd like to request
that Beta and Zeta go with your group.

If we're splitting into two groups, it will be easier
to coordinate if I know someone on your side.
I have no problem with that.
Wait. I'll go as well.
Uh...
As far as I'm concerned, this is a fight to save Cid.

I won't just be a burden. I'll retrieve my brother
with my own hands.

...Okay, fine. Then please go with Beta and Zeta to
the eastern side.
Freya, is thatâ
That's not a problem.

Okay. Thank you. I'm looking forward to working with
you.

However, given that, we should also send some of ours
with you.
Nonna and Rouge. I'm counting on you.
Got it.
Copy that!

That said, we might draw too much attention if there
are too many of us.

For the western team...Epsilon, Eta, Alexia,
Victoria, Nonna, Rouge, and me.

And for the eastern team, how about me, Olivier,
Lili, Sarasa, Beta, Zeta, and Claire?
Sounds good to me.

Let's make a detailed plan. You're returning to the
base, right?
Zeta.
Yes.

Got it. I just need to keep an eye on the members on
the other side, right?

Yes, we don't know anything about their background.
Besides, they're cunning and were sent over
spontaneously.

I'm counting on you, Zeta. If you stay with them for
a few days, you should be able to glean some
information. Please investigate and report back.

4.Text:
Master Shadow... How are you finding the view from
the throne?

The world was brought under control quickly. I don't
feel any particular way about it.

And besides, what's more important is the future, not
the past. We must ensure that the Shadow Kingdom
prospers for eternity.

Yes! I will follow you to the ends of the earth. As
your... His Majesty the King's one and only queen!

Well said. If you consider yourself as my partner,
I will show you the true essence of even greater
power.
Watch closely....
Wh-What? Master Shadow is growing larger?!

A-All I can see is Lord Shadow! Aaah! Aaah! This is
nothing but pure bliss!
*cough* ... *cough* Ah...ahh...!
Are you okay, Beta? Were you...unconscious?
...I'm fine. I was just taking a short break.
R-Really?

That vampire was the last one. Sarasa, are there any
injuries?

No injuries. Everyone's fine, thanks to your
directions.
But...
*huff* ... *huff* ...
Beta. Drink some water.
Uh... Thank...you.

I wasn't expecting to run into vampires. It looked
like they were about to return to their base.
Was that good or bad luck?

Well, the plan was to annihilate them once we stormed
their base, so it's good we were able to weaken their
forces in advance.

Fortunately, we still have a few days before the
rendevous, so let's rest in the village up ahead.

Zeta, are you okay? You must be under a lot of
strain.
Kinda, but I took a break a little while ago.
Well, that's fine then...
Hey, wait a second.
What is it?

Since we left the base, Zeta and Beta have been
working nonstop. We should consider rotating them or
giving them a rest.

The command of our comrades on the west side has been
handed over to Alpha.

And the command authority for the east side has been
entrusted to me. Do you understand that your
assertion is overstepping your authority and
disrupting the team's coordination?

You're suggesting that we change positions, but who
do we have to replace them?
You don't have the strength.
Whaâ?!

However, it's not my intention to command those who
are dissatisfied.
Beta. Zeta.
...No, I'm fine with the way it is.
Same here.

Though different from Lady Alpha's approach, I don't
think there's anything wrong with Freya's principles.

I believe that it's rational, from the team's
perspective, we receive efficient instructions that
maximize our abilities.

During battle, someone might have to push themselves
more, but...yeah, I think it makes sense.

In that case, please continue eliminating any
vampires you find. Leave none behind.
Understood.
Copy that.
And that's that.

The ones you're concerned about understand my way of
thinking, so there's no reason for an outsider to
complain, is there?
I'm glad that you understand.

We hunted down the remaining vampires. There's no
sign of any enemies here.
So it seems. In that case, let's go.
Sarasa.
Yes?

We'll be arriving at the village soon. Please keep
watch during our stay there.
Yep, understood. I'm on it.

(Keep watch? But we should have wiped out all the
vampires. Of course, it's better to be on the safe side,
but, maybe...)
What is it?
...Nothing. You are the one in command.
Are you alright, Beta? You don't look so good.
...I'm fine. Please don't worry about me.
(...I killed so many.)
(None of this mattered until now, because...)
Master Shadow...
Welcome!

We have a vacant house available for you to rest in.
Please make yourself at home.

I'll also be throwing a banquet tonight with a little
entertainment, so please do join us.

Thank you very much. We are grateful for your kind
hospitality.

No problem at all! Everyone just loves an excuse for
a party.

If you need anything, please let me know. Otherwise,
relax until the evening!

What a kind village to go out of their way for
travelers who just showed up.
...Hm...Indeed. Their kindness is almost too much.

...Wow, it sure is lively. For the entire village to
welcome us like this...
Yeahâ¦ I guess so.

Why would you say something like that? I know you're
tense, but you should try to relax.
Lili treated my wounds, I'm fine.

No, no. I can treat wounds, but I can't restore
strength or rejuvenate a depleted spirit.

Please, both of you, eat well and rest like Claire
said.

Look, this village's specialty fruit juice
smells and looks delicious.
Lili.
Ah, yes. What is it?

It seems a child from the village has developed
a fever. I'm sorry to ask, but could you
examine them?
Oh, that's terrible! I'll go right away!

It's the second house from the entrance. Thank you,
Lili.
Got it!
...Hey. Wasn't that house vacant?
Olivier.
...Got it.
Are you all enjoying yourselves?
Yes, thank you.

You all must be tired, so please, take your time to
relax. The fruit juice is a specialty of this village.
Have you had a chance to try some already?
Yes, we have. Haven't we, Olivier?
Huh? Ah, yes. We had some earlier, and it was, uh...
...Oh, yes. It's starting to take effect now.
It seems like a special drink only available here.
U-Ugh...

W-What? My throat and stomach...
all of a sudden...hot...
I can't...breathe...
Wh-What's happening? What on earth is going on?
Why are the rest of you okay?!

I only pretended to drink it, and those two probably
did as well.
I had a feeling something like this would happen.
That's too bad.
That woman said she drank it!

I did drink it. And didn't I say? It's a special
drink only available here.
Poisoned drinks are quite rare.
Poison...

It's poison strong enough to take down a giant boar!
Are you just going to leave that woman?
No, that's not how this will turn out because...
Claire!
Are you okay?! I'll give you an antidote right now!

You knew they were using poison! Why would you do
something so terrible?!
We fought vampires before coming here, didn't we?

Isn't it strange that such a peaceful village exists
in an area full of vampires?

This village does business with vampires. Or rather,
they're trusted by them.

By regularly offering villagers and travelers as
food, the village itself is spared from attacks.

Basically, they're vampire pawns. If left alone,
they would have leaked our information.

So, you made Claire drink poison just to
confirm that?

I suspected she might drink it, but I didn't force
her to.

The fact is, Beta and Zeta sensed something was off
and didn't drink it. The fact that she didn't notice
is her own fault.

Either way, as long as you're safe, there isn't a
problem. That's why I made sure you were evacuated
beforehand.
G-Grraaaaahhhh! Hey, you lot!

Let's surround them and attack! Gekitsuyon's henchmen
will be here soon, so hang in there till they arrive!
He's not coming. Sorry about that.
Huh...?

I've taken care of the man who tried to escape the
village to report us.
Ugh...ah...no...

So, keeping watch actually meant watching the
villagers, not vampires.
Sarasa, is everyone accounted for?

Yes, everyone is here. Doesn't look like anyone
is hiding.

Really? I saw signs of children, but as there aren't
any present, it's likely they were offered to the
vampires.

...These worthless scum. Not a single one shall
be spared.
Eek...!

D-Don't back down! Capture every last one of them,
and turn them over to Lord Gekitsuyon!

It's over... Just to make sure, let's check the area
for any survivors.
Claire, are you okay?
...Yeah, I think so. Thanks for saving me.
But was there no other way...?

Your failure to notice the poison was your weakness,
as was your inability to fight it.

In any case, if you can't handle this, you won't
stand a chance in the brutal battles against
vampires and Diablos.

Perhaps this was also a good opportunity for you to
reflect on yourself.

It's good that Lili was here, however she won't
always be there during a situation like this.
Claire...

(Yes, I also thought it was suspicious that a
peaceful village like this exists here.)

(Freya must have been aware of the situation from the
start and most likely considered all the
possible outcomes.)

(So, this is the wise general of the three heroes.
Rational and...cold-hearted.)
...Beta, are you okay?

(Ahh, Master Shadow... I don't understand whether or
not this is right.)

(After all, what is considered right for me was
because of you, Master Shadow.)
(So, without Master Shadow, right now, I...)
Diiieeee!!!
Ah! Oh no....

Ah...guh...damn... I have failed you,
Lord Gekitsuyon...

Looks like they're still breathing. I thought I'd
killed them, but wow, they're persistent.
Beta...

Counterattacking is the obvious response. Leaving
them alive would only come back to haunt us.
That was...the right decision.

5.Text:
...It's time. The eastern team should have arrived
by now.
Ugh... So tired... Can we go back?

There's no turning back. Especially now that we're
about to begin our assault.

Starting from the western entrance, we'll go inside
and exterminate the vampires within the base.
Everyone, charge!

(The surprise attack was a success, and the operation
is going smoothly. We can't be complacent, but we're
almost done.)
Lady Alpha, are you alright?

Yes, I'm fine. Go support any location that hasn't
been secured yet.
Understood!

Alpha. Since the number of vampires has decreased,
mind if I go scout the interior?

...Okay, go ahead. If something happens, return here
immediately.
Copy that.

(Nonna and Rouge are still no match for Olivier, but
they're quite exceptional.)
Haaah!!!

(Epsilon is as strong as ever, but No. 559's moves
aren't bad either.)
I'll...watch from a distance.
(The issue isâ)
Ugh... A-Aaah!!!

(I wonder if she's still affected by the incident
with Oliver.)

(I'm worried, but I shouldn't interfere. I'll just
keep an eye on things for now.)
I wonder if the eastern team is okay...

Are you worried about the two you sent over with the
other team? Beta and Zeta, was it?

I am. They've got strong personalities, and that
could be a lot to deal with over a few days.

Yeah, you're right. Olivier is such a mysterious
person.
You don't know much about her either?

She hasn't changed since the first time we met, but I
heard she was a different person in the past.
Is that so?

Apparently, she used to be quite determined and
honest, with a strong sense of justice.

Well if that's true, something must have happened
that changed her.
Her family was killed by a vampire.
Oh...

It seems Olivier joined the organization after that,
where she adapted to their system and awakened her
abilities.

But even if she becomes stronger, it's too late,
right? Her family is already gone.

That's just my speculation, but I don't think Olivier
has found a reason to fight.

If you're right, that would be a problem. People with
tragic pasts find it hard to change.

You're pretty insightful. Someone like you is a good
match for her.
...for Olivier?
Not just her but Lili and Freya too.

Lili has been with the organization since birth and
was basically raised by them. She must have
experienced some hardships that people who joined
later wouldn't understand.

Even so, she never takes her frustrations out on
others. Instead, she encourages everyone. Someone
called Lili the 'Holy Mother,' which fits her
perfectly.
The Holy Mother...

Freya is the same. She can be strict and inflexible,
but her instructions are always clear and decisive.

She's probably the most devoted to her comrades.
Maybe her strictness is just her way of ensuring
their safety.
That's all just your speculation?

Yes, that's right. The speculation of a friend who
trusts them. I think it's fairly accurate, though.
What was that...?

Alpha, there are no visible vampires around here.
Also, although we couldn't see them, the eastern
group arrived safely and is now fighting.
Excellent. That'sâ
Ack...!
Huh?! Alexia!
Wait, hold on.
Alexia is in trouble! We have to help her!
Sometimes, being helped can be just as distressing.
Huh...? What's going on...?
Haaaaaaahhh!
Does the situation really look that dire?
No... She's showing fierce determination.
She's still fighting.

What if outsiders worsen the situation by trying to
help?
...Got it. I'll keep an eye on things a bit longer.

Good call. Unless you want to end up on the receiving
end of Alexia's blade.
...So, have you all known each other for a while?
Yes, that's right. How could you tell?

We're from the Western Country. We came to this land
as wandering travelers.

While traveling, we've taken out a bunch of vampires.
Rouge is really skilled, and I've been counting on
her since we started working together.

I wouldn't be able to survive without Rouge.
Honestly, I'm not exaggerating.
Ah! You're flattering me again!
If you say things you like that, I...

(Maybe Rouge has feelings for Nonna, but that's
not something I should be speculating about.)

6.Text:
(I didn't want to get involved, but the princess is
reaching her limit. Looks like I'll have toâ)
What do you mean?! Stay out of my way!

I... I... I have to prove it! His sword...my sword...
I won't let it be disregarded!

If you go and get yourself killed, you won't be able
to talk about your sword. You should think about your
future.

In your sword, I can see all the hardships you had
to endure to get to where you are now.

Through injuries and suffering you press on.
Truly admirable, though imperfect swordplay.

Admirable? When I was easily defeated by a gifted
swordsman and overpowered by mere vampires...?
Don't act like you know what you're talking about.

Fine, I'll show you! I'll prove it! There is no sword
stronger than mine!

(A vampire...in one hit...? Why did she also
transform...?!)

Hmm...this looks bad... Maybe I should keep my
distance...

This transformation again... Is this a special
ability of future humans?

That's not it. I've never seen anything like it.
Not even in my original world.

It's rather ominous... Just like the demon Diablos...
It appears she's been consumed by an uncontrollable
power.

This ferocity is just like Diablos. Losing control,
and going on a blind rampage...

There are no other words for it besides...
demon transformation.

Through my effort and hard work my amateur swordplay
has become the strongest! I've surpassed him.
I've surpassed Shadow!
It's not possible to surpass Master Shadow!

I'll show you! But a worthless mutt like you won't
do. Bring me Shadow!

Haha! To your right! Now your left! Come on, if you
don't start dodging you'll lose your head!
(Shadow is dead. She should know that already!)
You can't handle her! Get back!

(The only way to stop her is by force. There's no
way I can hold back with her like this!)

Shadow! How long are you going to hide from me?
If that's how you want to play, fine! I'll slaughter
all of your friends!
Will that get you to show yourself?

I can't see anything through the dust...
Epsilon, No. 559!
Yes! We're safe! No. 559 is with me!

I'm fine... Taking cover...was definitely the right
call...
A-Alpha! Rouge...Rouge got caught in the collapse!
She's trapped under the rubble! IâI have to help her!
Nonna, calm down. You know better than that.

...We're just pulling back for now. We don't know
Rouge's condition. Don't give up.

7.Text:
Master Shadow? Is something the matter?
You look troubled.
Humans are such foolish creatures.
Huh?

The Shadow Kingdom has gained dominance, and the
world has become a better place. However, there are
those who do not appreciate this.

You mean.... A rebel faction is plotting the downfall
of the Shadow Kingdom?!
Yes. It seems they are after my head.

What fools...! Defying Master Shadow is unforgivable.
Let's find and eliminate them immediately.
For you, Master Shadow, Iâ
Beta.
Huh?!
Uh...What? Why are you so surprised?

...Oh, it's nothing. Looks like everyone has
returned.
We have completed our takeover of the eastern side.

Let's take a short break before we meet up with
Alpha and the others on the western side.

Everyone, have some water! If anyone is injured,
please let me know. I'll treat you!
Olivier, are you hurt anywhere?
No. Go and see to her instead.
Huh?! Claire! Are you hurt?!

It's nothing serious. Thanks to Olivier, it's only
a minor injury...
A minor injury, huh?
What?

The fact that you had to change means your clothing
got ruined. Was it someone's blood, or were they just
torn?

...Both. I'm glad we have spare clothes, but it's
a shame to ruin an outfit.
I'm glad you like the clothes of this era.

Wearing this outfit helps me blend in with the
surroundings, after all.

Yes! And it looks great on you! Claire, you look
so cute!

I'm not sure about cute... Though, looks aside,
it's very practical.
That's true. The design is very cute too, isn't it?
Like I said, it's not about how cute it is...

No, it's something we wear everyday, and I want
Master Shadow to like what he sees.
It's very important.
Like what he sees... Shadow...
Who's there?!
Ah...
So one survived.

He must be skilled at masking his presence if even
you didn't notice.
W-Wait! Please! I don't want to fight. I surrender!

Begging for mercy is pointless. This will be over
in an instant.
Eek!

Um...it looks like he really doesn't want to fight,
though...

That's what they always say. He could be lying,
and even if he isn't, he might change his mind.
Either way, there's no benefit to keeping him alive.
Okay...you're right.
Guh...
Hm?
...Huh?
Beta, why?

For Master Shadow's sake. We must do what needs to
be done.

Still, so suddenly... I never expected you to take
matters into your own hands.

It wasn't sudden. We have always been acting for
Master Shadow's sake.
That's true, but...
Either way, you did well.

With someone as skilled as you here with us,
will Alpha and the others be alright?

They have Nonna and Rouge but when it comes to
combat strength, they're not as strong, right?

As long as Lady Alpha is there, there's no need to
worry.
Can you put that much trust in her?
I guess. Is there a problem?
No.

While I acknowledge Alpha's strength, there is
someone stronger... Shadow, wasn't it?

He was defeated and killed by Diablos.
Don't get too overconfident.
What...? Master Shadow is...dead...?

8.Text: Shadow! Hurry up and show yourself!

(If we keep hiding here, it'll only be a matter of time
before we're found.)
Let's move further in.
This is...
Was there a fight here? The place is a mess.
*cough* This place hurts my throat...
There's nowhere to stand with all this rubble.
Wait. I can sense people nearby...
Huh? That voice... Is that Alpha?
Beta? Where are you?

Wait a moment! The rubble is blocking the way.
I can't get out!

But more importantly, I'm glad you're safe,
Lady Alpha!
We're safe, but we have a situation on our hands.

Are you okay over there? From the looks of things you
had a pretty rough time.

No, not at all. After the eastern team broke in,
they quickly defeated the vampires and gained
control.

There were no major injuries, and we were just
about to meet up with your group.
Then what about all of this rubble?

Well... A traitor showed up making ridiculous claims
that Master Shadow is dead.
...Huh?

But no need to worry. I already wiped them out,
with Master Shadow.
Beta, what are you...?
Shadow is...dead.
O-Olivier?!
You're hurt! What in the world happened?!
Olivier?
...Run, Alpha... She's already...
...It can't be.
Looks like I found a traitor.
Gah?!
Beta... You...

9.Text: Shadow! Hurry up and show yourself!

(I've gone back in time...! The Irreversible Pocket
Watch activated!)
(Butâ)

How dare a mere dog like you get in my way!
I'll cut off your head!

(At this point in the timeline... Princess Alexia has
already transformed...)
(Which means... There's no way to save her...)

(But...maybe Beta can still be saved. If we hurry
over to the eastern teamâ)
Bring out Shadow!

Listen up, everyone. If we stay here, eventually
we'll be found. Let's move out and meet up with the
eastern team.

Hmm... Moving while avoiding detection...
will be tough...
Well...

(Eta is right. But if we act now, we can still
prevent Beta's transformation.)
Lady Alpha.
I'll cover the rear. Please go on ahead.
Do you understand the situation we're in right now?

The way she is now, no one can handle
Princess Alexia's power on their own.
Don't worry. I'm prepared for that.

She'll probably start rampaging and destroy
everything around her. I will slip away using the
falling buildings as cover. Please, leave it to me.

That's not going to work. Let's find an opening and
escape together.
...Alright. Can I count on you?

10.Text: I'll fall back when I can. Now, hurry and go!

(I'm not sure about this, but I have to trust her.
I need to get to Beta.)

No. 559, be careful and please...don't push yourself
too hard.

Epsilon! We can still save her if we act now!
Cover me!

You're spreading lies about Master Shadow to bring
chaos to the kingdom, aren't you?!
Lady Alpha...?! Why are you getting in the way?
I'm not getting in your way. I'm trying to stop you.
No way! Why...? When there are traitors right there?!

Last time, Beta had fully transformed into a demon,
and all of you were defeated.
Aaaah! Master Shadow! You've come to us!
It's an illusion...a mass of magical energy.

You're wrong, Lady Alpha. That's the real Master
Shadow.

He created the Shadow Kingdom, and now we're ruling
it together.

I'm sorry. Did I push you too hard? If only I had
been there for you...

What happened? What did you feel? What caused you
such pain?

I'm sorry, I don't know. But I want to, so please
tell me everything.

Lady Alpha...I fought so hard. All for Master
Shadow...

I may have taken the lives of people who didn't
need to die.

But I don't know if I was right...because my sense
of what's right came from Master Shadow.

If Master Shadow isn't here... If he doesn't praise
me for doing well... I...
I'm...unsure of what to do, and I get anxious.

...I see. For someone who hates fighting to have to
do such things...

Master Shadow... Ah... I understand. All traitors
must be killed.
I will do anything for you!
I'm sorry, Beta. I put you through such hardship.
If only... If only I'd noticed.
Next time, I promise I'll save you. So, for now...
It disappears if the originator dies.
...No. It looks like we're not done yet.
Aha! There are even more dogs now!

If I defeat everyone here, then Shadow will have to
come out of hiding. Now, show yourself!

Swallowed by the darkness, huh? This is becoming
a pain.

You... Aha! I have a grudge against you as well.
So how about I quickly do away with you
before I get to Shadow!

Ugh... Your power and speed... You're like a
completely different person.

Don't underestimate me. Even with your monstrous
strength, you're still no threat to me...
(Olivier... At this rate, it will happen again...)

Carrying a corpse and not drawing your sword.
Are you underestimating me?
If you don't want to fight, just die already.
I'll behead every last one of you.

11.Text:
If that's how things turn out, you won't be able to
handle it alone.
We'll find an opening and escape together as a group.

Yes, Lady Alpha... I'll do my best not to slow us
down.
Ah!
I fouuund you. So this is where you were all hiding.

Fido, Butch, Champ, Lassie, and the rest! Line up
and show me your necks!

We don't have time for this. I'll finish this
quickly.

Hehehe... Where are your manners? A dog that bares
its fangs will have its head cut off!
Ack...!
I'm...fine!
How dare you fight back!
Agh!

How about you do a trick? If I like it, I might make
you my pet!
This isn't a joke! Whoâ
I see. You're rather persistent, aren't you?
Gah...
Ack...!

What do you think you're doing? Don't touch me with
your filthy hands!
I only want to see Shadow! You're of no use to me!

Cut into pieces, he'll collapse on the ground,
clinging to me moments before his death.

That's the Shadow I want to see! Hurry and bring him
to me!
Agh!
Lady Alpha, please...go!
Are you serious...?!
Hurry!
Let's go, Alpha! We can't let her actions be in vain!
Th-Thank you...
(We've made it. Beta and the others are in theâ)
...What?!

Shadow! What are you doing? Let me deal with the
small fry! Put away your sword!

I will take down every last traitor who plans to take
over the Shadow Kingdom!
Beta...is losing it...
L-Lady Alpha, what is that...?!
Beta... We were too late...
Too late? Did you...come back here from the future?

Yes. That's why I rushed here, but... I'm too late.
I couldn't stop her from transforming...

12.Text: Shadow! Hurry up and show yourself!
Alpha, is something wrong?
I'm back here again...
Again?

The artifact... The Irreversible Pocket Watch
triggered.
I've been back twice since we conquered the base.
...What happened?

(There's no time for me to explain. We won't be able
to stop Beta's transformation, even with all of our
strength.)
(What should I do?)
I fouuund you. So this is where you were all hiding.

Fido, Butch, Champ, Lassie, and the rest! Line up
and show me your necks!
There you are!

Lady Alpha, take the others and go.
I'll hold her back.
No. I already know what happens as a result of that.
Lady Alpha...?
Did you...come back?

What? You don't want to die? Then hurry up and bring
me Shadow! My business is with him!
(Think...)

(Even if we use everything we have and hurry to Beta,
we won't make it in time.)

(And in the end, she would still be killed by Princess
Alexia...)
(What should I do?)
...Will you...really let me go?
Lady Alpha?!

Yes, of course. So you've finally decided to reveal
Shadow's whereabouts?

Actually, I came to a realization. Even if you face
Shadow, you won't win.
...Huh?
Seems you can't quite believe it.
Of course not. I'm the strongest, after all.

There's no way I'd lose to someone like Shadow.
You're running your mouth like I won't kill you for
it.

Then why don't you go ahead and try? Shadow is just
beyond this passage.

...Fine. After I've defeated him, I'll have my fun
with all of you.
Lady Alpha, what are you doing...?
Beta will transform into a demon soon.
Really...?!

But even if we all head there now, we won't make it
in time. Beta is controlling multiple illusions of
Shadow and is prepared to attack.

Meanwhile, Princess Alexia has already transformed.
And she's completely obsessed with Shadow.
This is the information I picked up from the future.

There's no chance of us winning against one demon,
let alone two.

So we have no choice but to let them defeat each
other.

If Princess Alexia is obsessed with Shadow, we should
let them encounter, and defeat, each other.
With the countless illusions created by Beta.
I... I see... You've really thought about this.

We'll subdue them afterwards. Then we'll find a way
to reverse the transformation.
Lady Alpha...
I'll explain more about what happened along the way.

(I promised Beta that I would save her this time,
but all I can do is try to buy her some time.)
I'm...powerless.

13.Text:
With someone as skilled as you here with us,
will Alpha and the others be alright?

They have Nonna and Rouge but when it comes to
combat strength, they're not as strong, right?

As long as Lady Alpha is there, there's no need to
worry.
Can you put that much trust in her?
I guess. Is there a problem?
No.

While I acknowledge Alpha's strength, there is
someone stronger... Shadow, wasn't it?

He was defeated and killed by Diablos.
Don't get too overconfident.
...Huh?
Master Shadow is...dead?
...Looks like I found some traitors.
I'll handle them.
Ah...ah...ah...
Beta?
Ahh! Master Shadow! Aaaaaahhhhh!!!
Beta?! Why are you...?
Ack!
Freya, get back.
So many...traitors!
Urk!
Olivier?!
She's so strong. But...huh!
Aaah Master Shadow! What beautiful swordsmanship!

Not only are you strong, you're so mesmerizing I
can't look away! This is why you are my king!
Wh-What are you saying? Shadow isn't here...
Agh?!

...Huh? You too Zeta? What are you talking about?
Master Shadow is alive and well!

Don't tell me... Have you been corrupted by the
rebel faction...? Ahh.. Oh no... What should I do,
Master Shadow?!
Huh? Master...? There are multiple?
Don't let your eyes deceive you. They're illusions.
Urk!!

Zeta! Master Shadow is angry! Bow down and
apologize, now!

Gah! Even though they don't have any substance
...they hit hard!

How dare you plan to overthrow the Shadow Kingdom!
Your foolish ambition ends here!

Zeta! I'm in no position to help! You'll have to
handle this on your own!

On my own... Even if it is just an illusion, how long
can I go againstâ
Gah!
Zeta!

Lili! Claire and I will buy you some time! In the
meantime, treat and heal Zeta!
Y-Yes!
If they're all as strong as the original...
Then what?
We'll barely have any time.

...But we don't have a choice. If we do nothing,
we'll get wiped out.
Shaaadow!!!
Aha! I found youuu! And so many of you at that!
Princess Alexia?! What happened? Why are youâ?

Shadow! I came looking for you, to defeat you.
I'll cut off your head right here!

...Head? After Master Shadow's head...
Rebel faction...?

Aaaaahh!! You're an enemy too! An insolent beast
targeting Master Shadow!
What? Shut up. I don't have time for you.
What in the world?
Looks like they managed to run into each other.
Huh? Lady Alpha...

14.Text:
Shadow, I'll kill you to prove it! That my sword is
the strongest!
Aha! See, he's dead!

I don't know what you're talking about. There's no
way Master Shadow would be defeated.

Ahhh! What a brave performance! The people of the
Shadow Kingdom are so blessed!

Hmph! After I've beaten one, I'll do it as many
times as I need to. Haaahh!
Master Shadow!
Hehehe! Look at that!

That's our Master Shadow. Pretending to be defeated
and then multiplying as a strategy to wear down the
opponent!

What did you say?! Well, it doesn't matter. I'll kill
you as many times as I have to!
...I don't have any words.

One by one, Princess Alexia is defeating every Shadow
illusion Beta conjures. What a sight...

Even if we'd all jumped in together, we would have
been no match for those 3, including the illusions.
So this is as good an opportunity as any.
We should escape while they're fighting.
Are we just going to leave them behind?
Do you have a better idea?
Well...

I have no intention of leaving them behind. I want to
make sure that they defeat each other.

That being said, if we stay here, we'll only get
caught up in the fight. Let's retreat for the moment.
...Understood.
It seems this path is also a dead end.

I can't believe the route we used to get in here has
collapsed...
I wonder if Princess's Alexia's rampage caused this.

Or that vampire that got away could have collapsed
it to stop anyone going after them.
I found you!
Huh?! Beta!

I can't just let the rebel faction opposing Master
Shadow escape from right under my nose. As his queen,
I will deal with you all.

Queen? I don't get a word you're saying.
Get a hold of yourself already!

Get a hold of myself? That's what you need to do!
Why are you siding with them? Why are you trying to
threaten the peace of the Shadow Kingdom?!
Ugh, you're just not getting it!
It looks like Shadow's illusions aren't here.

Princess Alexia is fighting them. Beta's probably
exhausted and can't summon anymore.
If we're going to strike, now is the time.

Wait a minute. What if we tried to reason with Beta
instead of fighting her.
...Huh? Reason with her?

Yes! I don't think Beta hates us, and she definitely
doesn't want to have to hurt us.

If we explain that we're not part of any...rebel
faction, I think she'll stop fighting!

Beta is no longer able to distinguish illusion from
reality. What makes you think you can get through to
someone like that?
Um...well... We won't know for sure if we don't try!
If we speak sincerely, it will work!

We don't have time for that. You need to hurry and
leaâ
We can't...do that!
You need to understand the situationâ
No. I said we're not leaving you behind.
You...

I agree with Lili. Olivier, Lili, can I ask the two
of you to handle this?

We don't need to win as long as we don't lose.
We just need to not die.

And with Lili here, Olivier won't die. Just make sure
that Lili is protected.
Okay! Leave it to me!
You're pretty brutal as usual. But it's fine.
I'm putting my trust in you two. Don't let me down.

15.Text:
(...Lady Lili was trying to reason with Beta a moment
ago, but she should have seen this enough times by
now...)

(She only just met Beta, but to go that far for
her... She must care deeply for others...I guess.)
(She also comes off as a little...childish...)
Hurry, everyone. Let's find a way to get out of here.

We need to make the most of the time Lili and Olivier
are buying us.
Lady Alpha! Someone's coming!
You...!

*huff...huff...* I defeated all the Shadows...
I've proved it now, haven't I? That my sword is
the strongest!
Princess Alexia...
Tch... What bad timing.

Just by looking at her, I can see that she's wounded,
exhausted, and low on stamina.
If so, then we...

You defeated Master Shadow? Are you still spouting
that nonsense?!

Beta is here too?! Olivier and Lili were supposed to
be holding them off...
That was indeed the plan.
Oh, thank goodness! Olivier...Lili... You're safe.
Yes, for the most part...

We saw Princess Alexia after she defeated the Shadows
and pulled back. We led her here.
Good call. Both Beta and Alexia look exhausted.
All that's left is...
Gah! It's not nonsense! It's...the truth!

That's not true! That's not true! Master Shadow!
Master Shadow!
See! He's not coming out even when you call him!
Beta...
This will soon come to an end.

Master Shadow...would never just disappear and leave
us behind!
Why... Why don't you understand thaaaaaaaat?!
Gwah!

Beta also looks exhausted, but it seems she has the
upper hand.

*huff...huff...* I'll finish off...anyone who opposes
Master Shadow.
Beta.
Lady Alpha...? Please...move out the way...
Beta...
L-Lady Alpha...please let go!
You did great.

I'm sorry for putting so much pressure on you while
Shadow wasn't here...

I was oblivious to how you felt and couldn't be there
for you.
What? Master Shadow isn't gone...

I made you fight battles you didn't want to.
I relied on you too much.
If Shadow saw you...

He would praise you for sure.
"You did well, Beta."
Soâ
Urk...!
Rest well. Goodnight, Beta...

16.Text: I was able...to get outside...
I thought we were done for.

We managed to destroy the base, but...we suffered
many losses.

Beta is still unconscious. All the way here, she
hasn't shown any signs of waking up.
But...Lady Lili...
*sob* Rouge... Rouge...!
Let's wrap her up and carry her as she is.

Nonna, let's alternate carrying her.
It's quite far back to the baseâ
No, it's fine. I will carry her.
But...

Aside from this...there's not much more I can do
for Rouge.
So I want to do anything I can.
...I see.
Rouge was caught in the collapse?
Yes. That's where we found her body.
It was in such a state, I couldn't tell who it was.
*sob...sniff...* Freya, I can...
I told you it would be pointless.
Even you can't heal the dead, Lili.

Even if you could return her to her original form,
it wouldn't matter. You'd only have exhausted
yourself.
B-But! But!
Do you think Rouge would want that?
*sob* Rouge...

...Let's go. I want to get her out these bloodstained
clothes, and at least get her cleaned up.
Yes...Let's pick out her favorite clothes.

*sob* You're all so...kind. I'm sorry. All I can do
is cry...

...Don't worry about it. Olivier and I are used to
death. Your tears are our tears.
Thank you for crying for us, Lili.

(...The three heroes. They're different to what I
imagined from the legends.)

(Olivier. Outstanding physical ability and
swordsmanship.)
(Freya. An extremely calm and precise leader.)
(Lili. Possesses an ungodly amount of magical power.)

(They're still inexperienced in some areas, but
undoubtedly possess outstanding abilities.)

(I'm looking forward to seeing them become the
heroes that will be spoken of in legends.)
Let's confine Beta and Princess Alexia with Gamma.

Is it a good idea to keep them together? What if they
wake up and start fighting again, dragging Gamma into
it, too?
If that happensâ

Yukime? Are you asleep? Have you seriously been
asleep this whole time instead of keeping watchâ
Wait. She's not sleeping. She's unconscious.
...Huh?
Lady Alpha?
Gamma...
Has the transformation...reversed?

Hmm... So this is what it's like? Even tainted dark
red, magic is still magic.

A lot still remains a mystery, but all truths will be
exposed under the Red Moon.

But keep a close eye. Everything we've researched
up until now may be reduced to ashes.

Heheheh... Regardless, we're once again getting
closer to our goal.
Of a truly perfect world.

28.Text:
The situation remains dire.
But...now is the time to make a decision...

30.Text:
I...didn't make it in time.
I couldn't stop Beta...

29.Text:
We've stopped Beta, but...I never expected
Princess Alexia to intervene like that...

34.Text:
We need to quickly find an escape route...
We can't let the time Olivier and Lili
bought us go to waste...!

32.Text:
It's frustrating, but...this is the only choice
I can make right now...
I wonder how things are with Beta.

33.Text:
I will swiftly eliminate those...who target my lord!
Leave it to me, Master Shadow...!

27.Text:
Beta...? That power, that form...
Don't tell me you've also becomeâ

31.Text:
No matter what I do, there will be sacrifices...
I need to think of another way...!

26.Text:
Princess Alexia is
in over her head.
How is everyone else?

17.Text:
Now even Gamma is rampaging...
We've got no choice but to stop her.

24.Text:
I can't believe Princess Alexia ended up like that
as well... Anyway, we need to leave this place...!

23.Text:
The operation itself is going smoothly.
But, Princess Alexia...I'm a bit worried about her...

Rationally choosing the correct path...
This is the right decision...
Surely, that's what Master Shadow would doâ

22.Text:
Setting aside Princess Alexia...this situation seems
manageable. I wonder how the western team is faring...

21.Text:
I'm doing the right thing. Otherwise, all of this
is pointless... I wonder how the eastern team is
doing right now...

20.Text:
I think taking out the vampire base first is a good
strategy...but there's a lot that can go wrong.

*sigh* Oh, Master ShadowâNo!
I have to the best I can...!

19.Text:
The Three Heroes...are a lot of trouble.
The stories passed down about them...
are quite different from reality...

18.Text:
We've stopped Gamma, and the injured are almost
fully recovered... Guess that's one situation resolved...?

35.Text:
I'm sorry, Beta. And...rest peacefully.
This is the only way...

25.Text:
We move for Master Shadow.
We fight for Master Shadow.
As for anyone who defies his willââ

36.Text:
We managed to escape, along with the two who
transformed, but...what on earth is happening...?
